albot.snake

Class SnakeGame

  • java.lang.Object
    • albot.AlbotConnection
      • albot.snake.SnakeGame

  • public class SnakeGame
extends AlbotConnection
    A high level Snake library which sets up the connection and provides basic logic.

      • playGame

        public void playGame(java.util.function.Function<SnakeBoard,java.lang.String> decideMove,
                     boolean autoRestart)
        Plays an entire game by making moves returned by the function provided.
        Parameters:
        decideMove - a function which takes the current board as argument and returns a move to play
        autoRestart - whether you want the game to restart automatically after it has finished
